content.raw: This one will require a bit of thought and testing still, making more strings unicode may confuse code that is reading HDF5 files, particularly the labview programs that are reading connection tables. It is probably the case that connection tables are still storing bytestrings for everything in these changes, but I would want to make sure, and I'm not sure what else the LabVIEW programs are reading and whether they can handle unicode strings. I'll have to look into this.
